channel.title: CVE Feed for Dell -- PowerEdge Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dell -- PowerEdge Platform

item.title: CVE-2022-22558|2024-09-17T01:56:31.669Z -- dell -- poweredge%20platform
item.description: Dell PowerEdge Server BIOS and Dell Precision Workstation 7910 and 7920 Rack BIOS contain an Improper SMM communication buffer verification vulnerability. A Local High Privileged attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability leading to arbitrary writes or denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2024-38304|2024-08-29T08:03:40.261Z -- dell -- poweredge%20platform
item.description: Dell PowerEdge Platform, 14G Intel BIOS version(s) prior to 2.22.x, contains an Access of Memory Location After End of Buffer vulnerability. A low privileged attacker with local access could potentially exploit this vulnerability, leading to Information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2024-0172|2024-08-20T20:30:48.954Z -- dell -- poweredge%20platform
item.description: Dell PowerEdge Server BIOS and Dell Precision Rack BIOS contain an improper privilege management security vulnerability. An unauthenticated local attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability, leading to privilege escalation.

item.title: CVE-2024-0171|2024-06-25T19:45:49.921Z -- dell -- poweredge%20platform
item.description: Dell PowerEdge Server BIOS contains an TOCTOU race condition vulnerability. A local low privileged attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability to gain access to otherwise unauthorized resources.

item.title: CVE-2024-0172|2024-04-03T09:09:18.449Z -- dell -- poweredge%20platform
item.description: Dell PowerEdge Server BIOS and Dell Precision Rack BIOS contain an improper privilege management security vulnerability. An unauthenticated local attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability, leading to privilege escalation.

item.title: CVE-2024-0171|2024-06-25T15:30:42.589Z -- dell -- poweredge%20platform
item.description: Dell PowerEdge Server BIOS contains an TOCTOU race condition vulnerability. A local low privileged attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability to gain access to otherwise unauthorized resources.

item.title: CVE-2024-0171|2024-08-01T17:41:15.984Z -- dell -- poweredge%20platform
item.description: Dell PowerEdge Server BIOS contains an TOCTOU race condition vulnerability. A local low privileged attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability to gain access to otherwise unauthorized resources.

item.title: CVE-2024-0172|2024-08-01T17:41:16.006Z -- dell -- poweredge%20platform
item.description: Dell PowerEdge Server BIOS and Dell Precision Rack BIOS contain an improper privilege management security vulnerability. An unauthenticated local attacker could potentially exploit this vulnerability, leading to privilege escalation.

item.title: CVE-2024-38303|2024-08-29T04:34:53.178Z -- dell -- poweredge%20platform
item.description: Dell PowerEdge Platform, 14G Intel BIOS version(s) prior to 2.22.x, contains an Improper Input Validation vulnerability. A high privileged attacker with local access could potentially exploit this vulnerability, leading to Information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2024-38304|2024-08-29T13:28:35.429Z -- dell -- poweredge%20platform
item.description: Dell PowerEdge Platform, 14G Intel BIOS version(s) prior to 2.22.x, contains an Access of Memory Location After End of Buffer vulnerability. A low privileged attacker with local access could potentially exploit this vulnerability, leading to Information disclosure.
